00039 class Selection
00040 {
00041     typedef std::map<util::istring, unsigned short> MapType;
00042     MapType ent_map;
00043     int m_set;
00044 public:
00050     Selection( const char *entries );
00056     template<typename T> Selection( const std::map<T, std::string> &map );
00058     Selection();
00065     bool set( const char *entry );
00071     operator int()const;
00076     operator std::string()const;
00081     operator util::istring()const;
00086     bool operator==( const Selection &ref )const;
00091     bool operator==( const char ref[] )const;
00096     bool operator==( const int ref )const;
00098     std::list<util::istring> getEntries()const;
00099 };
00100 
00101 template<typename T> Selection::Selection( const std::map< T, std::string >& map ): m_set( 0 )
00102 {
00103     for( typename std::map< T, std::string >::const_iterator i = map.begin(); i != map.end(); i++ ) {
00104         const MapType::value_type pair(
00105             util::istring( i->second.begin(), i->second.end() ),
00106             i->first
00107         );
00108         assert( pair.second != 0 ); // 0 is reserved for <<NOT_SET>>
00109 
00110         if( !ent_map.insert( pair ).second ) {
00111             LOG( Debug, error ) << "Entry " << util::MSubject( pair ) << " could not be inserted";
00112         }
00113     }
00114 }
00115 
00116 }
00117 }
00118 
00119 namespace std
00120 {
00122 template<typename charT, typename traits>
00123 basic_ostream<charT, traits> &operator<<( basic_ostream<charT, traits> &out, const isis::util::Selection &s )
00124 {
00125     return out << ( std::string )s;
00126 }
